title: Drain the Oceans
plot: By scanning the locations at the bottom of the ocean where sunken ships, treasures and even cities lie, the show tries to answer what they look like, how they got there and if they hide any secrets.
stars: Craig Sechler, Russell Boulter, James Delgado
